channel.title: Advanced Macro Economics on BOBO's
channel.description: Recent content in Advanced Macro Economics on BOBO's

item.title: RCK Model
item.description: 1 Assumptions 1.1 Firms A large number of identical firms Product function: $Y=F(K, A L)$ $A$ grows exogenously at rate $g$ 1.2 Households A large number ($H$) of identical households The size of each household grows at rate $n$ Each member of the household supplies $1$ unit of labol at every point in time The household rents whatever capital it owns to firms Initial capital holdings; $K(0)/H$, $K(0)$: the initial amount of capital in the economy; No deprecation Devide its income at each $t$ between comsumption and saving to maximize the lifetime utility 1.
